participant_1.background:
My constant tardiness causes problems for my friends and family.
some call me a hopeless romantic.
I used to wear a suit every day to work.
until recently i have never been able to sing in front of anyone.
i have 5 children , though 2 have passed away.

participant_2.background:
My dog helps me collect firewood for my cabin.
My parents are proud of me, even though they don't understand my job.
i am a model building enthusiast.
hotdogs are my favorite food.
i lived most of my life not knowing who bob marley was.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play music. What about you?
I love to go hiking and camping. I also like to build model cars and play video games.
That's awesome! I love to go hiking too. I haven't been camping in a while, but I really miss it. I used to build model cars a lot when I was younger, but I haven't done that in a while either.
It's never too late to pick up a new hobby! I'm sure you'd love to get back into model building.
You're right! I think I might just do that. Thanks for the inspiration!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
I'm glad you're doing well. It sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies.
Thanks! I try to keep busy.
It sounds like you do! What's your favorite thing to do?
I think my favorite thing to do is spend time with my family and friends.
That's a great answer! I love spending time with my family and friends too.
